title: Why Texting At The Grocery Store Is Making You Fat + Bobby Helps Two Kids From His Hometown Go To College
itunes:title: Why Texting At The Grocery Store Is Making You Fat + Bobby Helps Two Kids From His Hometown Go To College
description:
Bobby shares a story on why texting is making people gain weight. Bobby is helping two kids from his high school go to college. Also, a listener who wanted the show to name her unborn baby calls in to reveal the official name following her gender reveal party.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
